product_overview: Quality Home Portal Imobiliário is a modern, premium real estate portal inspired by the Idealista design. It is geared towards real estate agents, individual owners, buyers, and renters, providing a complete platform for publishing, searching, viewing, and managing property listings with integrated AI and geolocation features.
core_goals: Facilitate the publication and management of real estate listings
Provide an intuitive search experience for buyers and renters
Offer robust administrative tools for real estate agents
Integrate cutting-edge technologies such as AI, Google Maps, and geolocation
Ensure a responsive, accessible, and secure user interface
key_features: Public Portal with splash screen, featured property listings, quick search, and category navigation
Advanced search system with multiple filters, location-based search, and interactive map views
Detailed property cards and pages with image/video galleries, descriptions, and contact information
Property publication journey with multi-step form, media upload, AI-generated titles and descriptions, and data validation
Secure admin dashboard with role-based authentication, metrics, property management, and simplified publication forms
Integration with Supabase for backend services including authentication, database, and media storage
Google Maps API for address autocomplete, geocoding, and interactive maps
Multi-language support (Portuguese, English, Spanish) for international users
Media management ensuring validation and optimized uploads for images and videos
Accessibility compliance with keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and color contrast standards
user_flow_summary: Visitor accesses the portal homepage and views featured properties
Visitor performs searches using filters or text input and browses results
Visitor views detailed property pages and contacts listing agents
Publishers navigate to the publish property section, fill out forms with AI assistance, upload media, validate data, and submit listings
Admin users log in securely, view dashboard metrics, manage properties with filters and actions, publish new listings, and log out
validation_criteria: Accurate search results with advanced filters and map integration
AI-generated property titles and descriptions are contextually relevant
Admin authentication and session management with role-based access control
Reject uploads of unsupported media formats or files exceeding size limits
Geolocation and maps display accurate user coordinates
Multi-language features switch UI text and content correctly
Compliance with accessibility standards for keyboard, screen readers, and contrast
Secure password encryption with bcrypt and HTTPS communication
Complete publication journey with all required validations completed successfully
